I'm not going to go through all

So over in the overview section,
there are our benchmark experiments,

which show you how Monty is performing
against our datasets and experiments.

In the How to Use Monty section, which
is where you'll get started, there's

the Getting Started Guide for how to

And then tutorials for actually
running experiments and
seeing Monty work in the wild.

And just to note that you do
not need GPUs to run Monty.

It runs natively on CPU-based
